content: Die App kann schon viel, aber warum lassen sich die Scheiben oder das Schiebedach nicht über die App öffnen bzw. schließen. An die Entwickler, bitte nachbessern.
english_content: The app can already do a lot, but why can't the windows or the sunroof be opened or closed via the app? To the developers, please improve this.

content: Leider genauso enttäuscht wie viele hier über die App. Ich kann weder den Status über meinen 7-er sehen noch sonst die App richtig nutzen. Leider hat mir die BMW Schweiz Hotline auch ned wirklich weiterhelfen können. Eigentlich sehr schade.....
english_content: Unfortunately, just as disappointed as many here about the app. I can’t see the status of my 7-series, nor can I really use the app otherwise. Unfortunately, the BMW Switzerland hotline couldn't really help me either. Actually a real shame....

content: Top App, verständlich, übersichtlich und funktional.
english_content: Top App, understandable, clear, and functional.

content: An sich eine informative App. Leider bleibt sie oft hängen. Die fehlende Stabilität nervt.
english_content: An informative app in itself. Unfortunately, it often freezes. The lack of stability is annoying.

content: Super App. Alles über Handy abrufbar. Vom Tanken bis hin zur HU. Sehr Empfehlenswert. Dafür gibt es auch 5 Sterne 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
english_content: Super App. Everything retrievable via mobile phone. From refueling to the vehicle inspection (HU). Highly recommended. That’s why it gets 5 stars 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟

content: Einfach eine sehr gute und hilfreiche App.
english_content: Simply a very good and helpful app.

content: Die komplizierteste App die es überhaupt gibt. Bis so ein Update bei dem Auto ankommt kriegt ne alte Frau n Kind. Selbst ein Stern ist noch zu viel
english_content: The most complicated app there is, period. By the time an update like that arrives in the car, an elderly woman will have a child. Even one star is too much.

content: App sehr schön aber alle Funktionen funktionieren nicht weil mein Auto zu alt ist 2014 es soll ein Update kommen aber wann ist die Frage. LG an BMW Update 30.11 noch schlechter
english_content: App very nice but not all functions work because my car is too old, 2014. An update is supposed to come, but when is the question. Regards to BMW. Update 30.11 even worse.

content: Alles wichtige ist schnell abrufbar
english_content: Everything important is quickly accessible.

content: Funktioniert einwandfrei. Bin bis jetzt voll und ganz zufrieden.
english_content: Works flawlessly. I’m completely satisfied so far.

content: Schrott, man kann sich gar nicht mehr anmelden. Sobald man auf das Feld für die Passworteingabe klickt, schmeißt es einen gleich komplett raus. Ein Stern ist auch zu viel 👎
english_content: Junk, you can't even log in anymore. As soon as you click on the password field, it completely kicks you out. One star is too much 👎

content: Ist bei manchen Modellen, wie z.b. bei meinem 320ger g21 ohne teueres Abo (89 Euro im Jahr) unbrauchbar. Es ist keine einzige Funktion möglich. Schade.
english_content: It's unusable on some models, like my 320 g21, without the expensive subscription (€89 per year). Not a single function is possible. Shame.

content: Die App lief 2 Tage auf meinem neuen Handy danach beim Öffnen verbindet sie sich ganz kurz mit meinem neuen bmw f39 und stürzt ab. War zu bmw Händler er meinte es läge an der App
english_content: The app ran for 2 days on my new phone, then when opening it, it connects briefly to my new BMW F39 and crashes. I took it to a BMW dealer and he said it was due to the app.

content: Es fehlen wichtige Infos zu meinen f11 lci über tankfüllstand und Kilometerstand. Auch ist die App und die Verbindung zum Fahrzeug sehr langsam. Hier erwarte uch mehr Performance.
english_content: Important information regarding my F11 LCI is missing, specifically about fuel level and mileage. Also, the app and the connection to the vehicle are very slow. I expect more performance here.

content: schade dass der Concierge Service eingestellt wurde. und bitte die Fahrzeugortung erweitern
english_content: “It’s a shame the Concierge Service was discontinued. And please expand the vehicle location feature.”

content: Die App hat immer gut funktioniert. Seit dem letzten Update kann ich meine Fahrten nicht mehr ansehen.
english_content: The app has always worked well. Since the last update, I can no longer view my journeys.

content: Ständig die Neuanmeldung, die dann auch noch nicht Mal funktioniert. Dann wird man genötigt Chrome zu nutzen, was auch nicht funktioniert. Fragt man sich, was für Programmierer von BMW beschäftigt werden.
english_content: Constant re-registration, which also doesn’t even work. Then you're forced to use Chrome, which also doesn’t work. You wonder what kind of programmers BMW employs.

content: Remote Parking fehlt obwohl Fahrzeug es unterstützt.
english_content: Remote Parking is missing even though the vehicle supports it.

content: Es fehlen einfache Features die heute eigentlich Standart sind: -Kein Dark Mode! -Aktuell anliegender Ladestrom wird nicht angezeigt -Ladestrom kann nicht angepasst werden
english_content: Simple features that are standard these days are missing: -No Dark Mode! -Currently applicable charging current is not displayed -Charging current cannot be adjusted

content: Es geht seit Tagen mal wieder gar nichts..! App Anmeldung und wenn man es mal schafft "drinnen" zu sein funktioniert auch nicht alles...Standort Fahrzeug abrufen, Route ans Fahrzeug etc... Im Auto alles aktuviert, GPS usw..ärgerlich bei Fahrzeugen in der Preisklasse..
english_content: Nothing has been working again for days..! App login and even when you manage to get in, not everything functions... Retrieving vehicle location, sending routes to the vehicle, etc... Everything activated in the car, GPS, etc. Annoying for vehicles in this price class..

content: Eine Anmeldung ist seit Tagen nicht mehr möglich. "Es ist ein Fehler aufgetreten, später nochmals versuchen! 3020". Email an Hotline wird nicht beantwortet!😟
english_content: “Logging in hasn’t been possible for days. An error occurred, try again later! 3020. Email to the hotline isn't being answered! 😟

content: Bin mit der App sehr zufrieden. Hat uns in einer brenzligen Situation geholfen. Und zwar, hatten wir den Fahrzeugschlüssel im Kofferraum liegen und die Heckklappe geschlossen. Dank der App, konnten wir das Auto über unseren Smartphone wieder öffnen. 👍
english_content: I'm very happy with the app. It helped us in a tricky situation. We had left the car key in the trunk and the tailgate was closed. Thanks to the app, we were able to unlock the car again via our smartphone. 👍

content: Wenn der Fahrzeugstatus über die App nicht aktualisiert werden kann, die Daten werden von der Vergangenheit angezeigt, dann müssen im Fahrzeug über das i Drive Menü alle BMW Dienste aktuallisiert werden. Wurden diese aktualisiert dann Connected Drive deaktivieren. Kurz warten dann Conneced Drive wieder aktivieren. Wärend der Aktualisierung darf das Fahrzeug nicht gefahren werden. Anschließend in der App den Fahrzeug Status akkualisieren. Bei mir hat es so funktioniert. Alles wieder ok.
english_content: “If the vehicle status can’t be updated via the app, and the data displayed is from the past, then you need to update all BMW services in the vehicle via the iDrive menu. Once these have been updated, deactivate Connected Drive. Wait a short while, then reactivate Connected Drive. The vehicle must not be driven during the update. Afterwards, update the vehicle status in the app. This is how it worked for me. Everything is ok again.”

content: Die neue App hat die vorherige App nur verschlimmbessert. Respekt, ich dachte nicht das dieses Möglich ist. Warum kann man z. B. nicht mehr spontan die Klimatisierung einschalten? Zu teuer? Zu einfach? Zu Kundenfreundlich? Wenn man sich überlegt was man für die ganzen Softwarezusätze bezahlen muss ist es schon, gelinde ausgedrückt, eine Unverschämtheit was dafür geboten wird. Langsam tendiere ich dazu dass das nächste Auto kein BMW mehr wird.
english_content: The new app has only made the previous app worse. Seriously, I didn't think that was possible. Why, for example, can you no longer spontaneously activate the climate control? Too expensive? Too simple? Too customer-friendly? Considering what you have to pay for all the software additions, it’s, to put it mildly, an outrage what is offered in return. I’m slowly tending towards the next car not being a BMW.

content: Bis jetzt funktionierte alles einwandfrei, in letzter Zeit fehlerhaft, einiges versucht aber ohne Erfolg.
english_content: Up until now, everything worked flawlessly, recently buggy, some things tried but without success.

content: is von BMW...muss also gut sein ;) tolle App funktioniert und macht spaß
english_content: It’s from BMW… so it has to be good ;) great app, works and is fun.

content: Nach jedem Update wieder neu anmelden - genial
english_content: Re-logging after every update – brilliant.

content: BMW ist besser als mein RangeRover. Vor allem was die digitale Technik an geht.
english_content: BMW is better than my RangeRover. Especially when it comes to digital technology.

content: Einfach genial wenn man stets in ein temperiertes Auto einsteigen kann - egal ob es draußen kalt oder heiß ist 😀
english_content: Simply brilliant when you can always get into a pre-conditioned car – whether it's cold or hot outside 😀

content: App funktioniert nicht. Ich kann die AGB nicht runter laden. Zeigt mir immer an das ich es später nochmal versuchen soll. Weil es momentan nicht möglich ist
english_content: App isn’t working. I can’t download the Terms and Conditions. It always tells me to try again later because it’s currently not possible.

content: Dalla versione 2.11.0, con IDrive 6 e telefono Android 12 collegato via Bluetooth, non si attiva più l'opzione "app". L'ultima versione funzionante è la 2.9.3. Dalle versione 3.5.2 il problema è stato risolto.
english_content: Since version 2.11.0, with iDrive 6 and an Android 12 phone connected via Bluetooth, the app option no longer activates. The last working version is 2.9.3. From version 3.5.2 the problem has been resolved.

content: Riuscire a fare un'app. su misura rispondente quanto più possibile alle necessità del veicolo sarebbe un amibizioso traguardo. Si potrebbe dedicare una sessione specifica "veicolo" comprendente tutti gli interventi, manutenzione, sostituzioni e quant'altro per tenere elevato lo stato degli interventi. Ove possibile si potrebbe includere lo stato di usura dei componenti e altro aumentando così la performance delle app. Distinti saluti
english_content: Achieving a custom app that responds as closely as possible to the needs of the vehicle would be an ambitious goal. A specific vehicle section could be dedicated to all interventions, maintenance, replacements, and so on, to keep the state of interventions high. Where possible, the wear status of components could be included, further increasing the app's performance. Sincerely

content: È da più di 2 settimane che l'app non funziona, oltre al fatto che la precedente aveva più funzioni e funzionava meglio. Vorrei ricordare che questo servizio è a pagamento.
english_content: The app hasn't been working for over two weeks, on top of the fact that the previous version had more features and worked better. I’d like to remember that this service is a paid one.

content: Pessima! Dopo appena un mese e mezzo dall'installazione si e' bloccata, come lamentato anche da altri utenti. Non aggiorna, infatti, lo stato e la posizione della vettura e non invia i comandi da remoto. Peraltro la funzione fa parte di un pacchetto a pagamento.
english_content: Terrible! After just a month and a half since installation, it froze, as also reported by other users. It doesn’t update the vehicle's status and location, and it doesn't send remote commands. Moreover, this function is part of a paid package.

content: Comandi da remoto verso la macchina molto lenti
english_content: Remote commands to the car are very slow.

content: Utile, peccato che a volte non fa il refresh dei dati in tempo reale
english_content: Useful, it’s a shame it doesn’t refresh data in real time sometimes.

content: La app funziona bene. Sarebbe molto utile poter impostare la pianificazione delle ricariche su base settimanale cosi da coincidere con le fasce dei gestori dell'energia elettrica che ad es. nel weekend hanno tariffa più bassa tutto il giorno.
english_content: The app works well. It would be very useful to be able to set charging schedules on a weekly basis so they coincide with energy providers' time-of-use rates, which, for example, have a lower rate all day on weekends.

content: sarebbe molto utile connessione con account Google
english_content: It would be very useful to have connection with a Google account.

content: Digital key non compatibile con s22, che vergogna
english_content: Digital Key not compatible with S22, how embarrassing.

content: decisamente un grande aiuto per avere sempre l'autovettura sotto controllo
english_content: definitely a great help for always keeping the car under control

content: La vecchia app BMW connected era organizzata con layout a mio parere più chiaro e piacevole. Ma vabbè.. Ora la localizzazione del veicolo risulta più lenta, non utilizza più la dettagliata mappa google, inoltre non consente più di navigare a piedi verso il proprio veicolo. Secondo me con questa app si sono fatti non uno, ma ben due passi indietro rispetto la precedente. Se poi contiamo che è un sevizio a pagamento... Mah!!!....
english_content: “The old BMW Connected app was organized with a layout that, in my opinion, was clearer and more pleasant. But okay… Now vehicle location is slower, it no longer uses the detailed Google Maps, and it no longer allows you to navigate on foot to your vehicle. In my opinion, with this app they’ve taken not one, but two steps backward compared to the previous one. And if we also factor in that it’s a paid service… Meh!!!…”

content: facile da usare, efficente e utile per avere il controllo dell'auto da remoto
english_content: Easy to use, efficient, and useful for having remote control of the car.

content: Serve un aggiornamento che risolva una volta per tutte il problema della registrazione viaggi... ogni tre per due quest'ultima non funziona. Se fosse un problema di ID9 intervenite per favore sul software dell'auto, altrimenti "i miei viaggi" rimane totalmente inutile (dato registra a random...).
english_content: An update is needed to permanently fix the trip recording issue... it fails every three and two. If it's an ID9 problem, please intervene on the car's software, otherwise My Trips remains totally useless (data records randomly...).

content: precisione e modalità di avviso sempre in anticipo
english_content: Precision and advance warning mode.

content: App stabile e precisa. Molto utile e molto comoda. Migliorerebbe un poco se desse la possibilità di gestire dallo smartphone le app dell'auto
english_content: Stable and accurate app. Very useful and very convenient. It would improve a little if it offered the possibility to manage the car's apps from the smartphone.

content: L'applicazione è utile. La uso da 6 mesi, cioè da quando ho preso l.auto. È sempre andata bene, fino all.ultimo aggiornamento di pochi giorni fa. Ora, senza alcun motivo va in crash mentre la uso. Schermo nero e anche attendendo non cambia. Resta così. Bisogna chiuderla con tasto indietro del telefono o eliminarla dalle app aperte Poi riparte regolarmente. Attendo che torni funzionante al 100% per migliorare la valutazione
english_content: The app is useful. I've been using it for 6 months, that is, since I got the car. It has always worked well, until the last update a few days ago. Now, for no reason, it crashes while I'm using it. Black screen and even waiting, it doesn't change. It stays like that. You have to close it with the phone's back button or delete it from the open apps. Then it restarts regularly. I'm waiting for it to be fully functional again to improve the rating.

content: All'inizio, non avendola mai avuto ho avuto qualche difficoltà, ma ora la consiglio a tutti.
english_content: Initially, I had some difficulties not having used it before, but now I recommend it to everyone.

content: esperienza positiva con Bmw dal 2005
english_content: Positive experience with BMW since 2005

content: Concordo con l'opinione di informatici incapaci in quanto sto cercando di recuperare la password inserisco il codice cliente presente nella mail e appare la dicitura dato errato. Senza parlare delle telefonate avevo 17 davanti ho atteso il mio turno e quando era arrivato la comunicazione è caduta. Stessa cosa un momento fa mentre parlavo con l'operatore. Se registrano le telefonate le ascoltino
english_content: I agree with the opinion of incompetent IT people because I'm trying to recover my password, I enter the customer code from the email and the message incorrect data appears. Not to mention the phone calls: I had 17 in the queue, I waited for my turn, and when it was my turn, the connection dropped. Same thing just now while talking to the operator. If they record the phone calls, they should listen to them.

content: Quale funzione in più sarebbe stata utile....(apertura chiusura finestrini)
english_content: Which extra function would have been useful....(window opening and closing)

content: buona, utile e molto intuitiva.
english_content: Good, useful, and very intuitive.

content: Una volta istallata l'app, clicco su login e parte una landing di caricamento infinita. Non riesco ad accedere
english_content: Once the app is installed, I click on login and an endless loading screen starts. I can’t access it.

content: Da una casa come la BMW potrebbero fare molto ma molto meglio
english_content: “From a company like BMW, you could expect so much more.”

content: Pessima applicazione non all'altezza del marchio. Ogni giorno chiede di ri-autenticarsi.
english_content: Poor application, not up to the brand’s standards. It asks you to re-authenticate every day.

content: è divertente oltre che utile. avere i dati a portata di mano spesso torna comodo.
english_content: It’s fun as well as useful. Having the data at hand is often convenient.

content: App funzionale ed utile per il controllo dell'auto in remoto.
english_content: Functional and useful app for remote car control.

content: Da quando l'ho installata non funziona più Spotify!
english_content: Since I installed it, Spotify doesn't work anymore!

content: Una applicazione utile, che fornisce buone informazioni
english_content: A useful application, providing good information.

content: Il sistema antivirus mi segnala che l'applicazione è infettata e consiglia di rimuoverla, cosa che ho fatto. Potete verificare?
english_content: My antivirus system flags the application as infected and recommends removal, which I’m doing. Can you check?

content: bella applicazione, io per ora la uso per controllare lo stato del mezzo e abbassare la temperatura nelle giornate assolate. non mi è chiara la differenza con l'app bmw connected. tra le due ho scelto questa.
english_content: Nice application, so far I'm using it to check the vehicle’s status and lower the temperature on hot days. I’m not clear on the difference with the BMW Connected app. Between the two, I chose this one.

content: Aplicación penosa, en esta nueva actualización se cargan también la prestación del claxon en remoto. Una verdadera estafa. Cualquier vehículo tiene mejores prestaciones que la app de BMW. BMW = Sablazo y estafa.
english_content: Miserable app, with this new update they’ve even loaded the remote horn function. A real rip-off. Any vehicle has better features than the BMW app. BMW = Rip-off and scam.

content: Vamos a peor, ni de abre.
english_content: Getting worse and worse, it won't even open.

content: Está todo bien,solo que me gustaría que si suena la alarma del coche la aplicación me informara
english_content: Everything's fine, just that I would like it to notify me in the app when the car alarm sounds.

content: Muy buena aplicación para tener datos y acceso al coche!
english_content: Very good app for having data and access to the car!

content: Muy útil y fácil de usar.
english_content: Very useful and easy to use.

content: La aplicación es muy completa y funciona bastante bien, pero tiene errores p.e. en el cálculo del kilometraje en las reseñas mensuales, o en las estadísticas de viajes.
english_content: The app is very comprehensive and works quite well, but it has glitches, for example, in the calculation of mileage in the monthly reviews, or in the travel statistics.

content: Es una porquería. No se conecta porque seguro no había un buen enlce con los datos de los autos. Lanzan algo que no sirve !!
english_content: It's a mess. It doesn't connect because surely there wasn’t a good link with the car’s data. They release something that doesn’t work!!

content: Mejor coche,asistencia y app....muy difícil de mejorar👍
english_content: Better car, assistance and app....very difficult to improve 👍

content: Me dice que lamentablemente el cambio automático del país asignado no es compatible con mi bmw. Estoy en México y tengo una X3 M40i 2018.
english_content: It tells me that unfortunately, automatic country assignment changes are not compatible with my BMW. I’m in Mexico and have a 2018 X3 M40i.

content: no me funciona spotify y ninguna app con esta nueva app
english_content: Spotify doesn't work for me and neither does any other app with this new app.

content: La app debería incluir algún aviso cuando se activa la alarma del vehículo.
english_content: The app should include some kind of notification when the vehicle alarm is activated.

content: Una app sencilla de utilizar y muy completa y útil
english_content: A simple app to use and very complete and useful.

content: me permite saber dónde está el auto
english_content: It lets me know where the car is.

content: La aplicación está muy bien le doy cuatro estrellas por que esta todo muy bien pero todavía no he leído un comentario sobre un fallo sobre serrar el vehículo si la puerta o las puertas está abierta le da cerrar y perfecto pero si se te olvida una o varias ventanillas no silve de nada el cierre a distancia yo he tenido que volver al coche en mas de una vez para cerrar ventanas así que le dare cinco es cuando arreglen este fallo por que la aplicación está muy completa pero ese fallo la estropea
english_content: The app is very good, I give it four stars because everything is very good, but I haven't yet read a comment about a failure regarding locking the vehicle if the door or doors are open. It locks perfectly, but if you forget a window or several, the remote locking is useless. I'm having to return to the car more than once to close windows, so I'll give it five when they fix this failure because the application is very complete, but that failure ruins it.

content: Interesante aplicación para localizar el vehículo y gestionar su mantenimiento, así como otras funcionalidades. Debería poder localizarse el vehículo en marcha y no únicamente parado.
english_content: Interesting app for locating the vehicle and managing its maintenance, as well as other functionalities. It should be possible to locate the vehicle while it's moving and not only when it's parked.

content: La aplicación está muy bien. El control remoto me encanta, y poder comprobar el estado del vehículo, la ubicación, activar el aire antes de llegar al coche... No le pongo 5 estrellas porque no me parece justo que para unos coches el servicio remoto sea gratuito y para otros cueste 80€ al año.
english_content: The app is really good. I love the remote control, and being able to check the vehicle status, location, activate the air conditioning before arriving at the car... I don't give it 5 stars because I don't think it's fair that for some cars the remote service is free and for others it costs €80 per year.

content: Le falta muchísimo desarrollo a su app.
english_content: It really lacks development.

content: Como es usual en BMW, algo "actualizaron" y dejó de funcionar lo poco que hacía, ni siquiera abre y "olvidó" "miBMW"
english_content: As is usual with BMW, they updated something and it stopped working, the little it did. It doesn't even open and forgot MyBMW.

content: No funciona spotify, por favor revísenlo, en la app anterior funcionaba algunos días,pero bueno...pero en esta jamas ha funcionado Gracias!!!!
english_content: Spotify isn't working, please review it. In the previous app it worked some days, but well...but it's never worked in this one. Thanks!!!!

content: Mucho peor que la anterior. Además, desde la última actualización, si no permites el acceso a la ubicación, no puedes abrirla. Connected dejaba el fondo en negro y daba información de la presión de las ruedas, cosa sin la que puedo pasar, pero no por tener que permitir acceso a la ubicación. Los mapas también funcionan peor, no sé si han dejado de usar google, pero no encuentra los sitios igual ni tiene todos los que tenía la anterior. Seguiré usando connected hasta que la quiten.
english_content: Much worse than the previous one. Furthermore, since the last update, if you don't allow location access, you can't open it. Connected used to leave the background black and showed tire pressure information, something I can live without, but not for having to allow location access. The maps also function worse; I don’t know if they’ve stopped using Google, but it doesn’t find places the same way or has all the ones the previous version had. I’ll continue using Connected until they remove it.

content: Tarda muchísimo y no da litros y autonomía en todos los modelos.
english_content: It takes forever and doesn’t show liters and range for all models.

content: No me funciona desde hace meses. BMW no aporta solución. Sólo que hay que esperar a la siguiente actualización, que no se sabe cuándo saldrá
english_content: It hasn't worked for months. BMW doesn’t offer a solution. They just say you have to wait for the next update, which we don’t know when it will be released.

content: información al momento se esté donde se esté
english_content: information at the moment wherever you may be

content: Muy buena aplicación. Puedes ver en todo momento el estado del vehículo, programar la calefacción o el aire acondicionado, abrir/cerrar el coche de forma remota, ver la ruta que tienes que hacer desde el móvil y enviarla al BMW,...
english_content: Very good application. You can always see the status of the vehicle, schedule the heating or air conditioning, remotely open/close the car, see the route you need to take from your mobile and send it to the BMW,...

content: Muy fácil y muy útil
english_content: Very easy and very useful

content: No puedo ingresar, me indica error 3021
english_content: I can’t log in, it shows error 3021.

content: servicio, información y atención al cliente, magníficos. Cumplimiento de plazo, impecable
english_content: Service, information, and customer support, magnificent. Timeliness, impeccable.

content: Bastante completo y muy intuitivo
english_content: Quite complete and very intuitive.

content: De nada sirve si no pagas
english_content: It’s useless if you don't pay.

content: Buena aplicación para el control y localización del vehículo, falta pulir detalles pero en general es bastante útil.
english_content: Good app for vehicle control and location, some details need polishing but overall it's quite useful.

content: Application très conviviale et informative ... C'est vraiment fort utile.
english_content: Very user-friendly and informative application... It's really very useful.

content: Fonctionne sur x5 de 2017, mais l associer avec here au lieu de maps, c est ridicule, impossible de trouver des adresses que l on trouvait avec maps.
english_content: Works on a 2017 x5, but pairing it with HERE instead of Maps is ridiculous, impossible to find addresses that were found with Maps.

content: Excellente application : l'essentiel au creux de la main 😉
english_content: Excellent app: the essentials at your fingertips 😉

content: très bien dans l'ensemble
english_content: very good overall

content: Une excellente application qui donne des renseignements très utiles en temps réel.
english_content: An excellent app that provides very useful real-time information.

content: Nul ! Dès que vous l'ouvrez on vous demande de changer de mot de passe puis de s'identifier 2x et il faut faire les mises à jour etc donc il faut déja 20minutes pour pouvoir avoir une app qui fonctionne bref après faut se connecter au wifi de la voiture qui te dit qu'il n'y a pas de conection alors que tu es parfaitement connecté, bref cet app est pire qu"une banque pour rien, car en plus elle ne fonctionne pas donc totalement inutile !
english_content: Terrible! As soon as you open it, you’re asked to change your password then identify yourself 2x and you have to do the updates etc so it already takes 20 minutes to get an app that works, briefly. Then you have to connect to the car's Wi-Fi which tells you there’s no connection when you’re perfectly connected. Briefly, this app is worse than a bank for nothing, because on top of that it doesn't even work, so totally useless!

content: Excellente appli pour gérer un véhicule BMW, fonctionnelle et bien conçue !
english_content: Excellent app for managing a BMW vehicle, functional and well-designed!

content: Encore déconnecter est plus possible de ce connecter alors que cela fonctionne sur le site Web via bmw.fr
english_content: It’s still impossible to reconnect, even though it works on the website via bmw.fr

content: Pratique mais pourrait encore être amélioré (suivi des consommations en plus des recharges)
english_content: Practical but could still be improved (consumption tracking in addition to charging).

content: Bmw serie 1 de 2021 : Je trouve l'application au top 👍
english_content: BMW 1 Series 2021: I find the app top 👍

content: Depuis le 1er septembre l'application s'est déconnectée de la voiture sans raison apparente. J'ai supprimé et réinstallé l'application sans succès. Pourtant quand je suis dans la voiture un message de connection Bluetooth et WiFi est affiché par l'application sur mon téléphone.
english_content: Since September 1st, the app has been disconnecting from the car for no apparent reason. I’ve deleted and reinstalled the app unsuccessfully. Yet when I’m in the car, a Bluetooth and WiFi connection message is displayed by the app on my phone.

content: Bonne application qui mériterait d'être plus complète. Je mets 4 étoiles car les fonctions avancées et tellement utiles sont manquantes. (niveau adBlue et lave glace, pression des pneumatiques). J'espère que l'équipe de développeurs comblera rapidement ces lacunes.
english_content: Good app that deserves to be more complete. I'm giving it 4 stars because the advanced and so useful functions are missing (AdBlue and washer fluid level, tire pressure). I hope the development team quickly fills these gaps.

content: Appli bidon qui n apporte pas grand chose
english_content: Useless app that doesn't bring much.

content: simple, fluide manque néanmoins des options.
english_content: simple, fluid, but lacking options.

content: très pratique et bien conçu
english_content: very practical and well designed

content: Il est regrettable de d'avoir un smartphone dernière génération pour pouvoir utiliser une application.
english_content: It’s regrettable to need a latest-generation smartphone to be able to use an application.

content: Application bien faite certes avec fonctions basiques mais tout a fait suffisantes. Enfin depuis la derniere MAJ via remote software update (ce matin), la voiture ne veut même plus mettre a jour les infos de localisation, trajets, utilisateurs,... on dirait qu elle n a simplement plus accès a internet. Pour info, la voiture n a pas encore 6 mois.
english_content: Well-made application, certainly with basic functions but entirely sufficient. Finally, since the last update via remote software update (this morning), the car no longer wants to update the location, journeys, users' information,... it’s as if it no longer has access to the internet. For your information, the car hasn't been out for less than 6 months.

content: application permettant d'interagir efficacement avec le véhicule
english_content:
application permettant d'interagir efficacement avec le véhicule

application allowing for effective interaction with the vehicle

content: Abonnements à des tarifs exorbitants pour des services bien souvent offerts dans d'autres marques moins "prestigieuses" .....L'accès à de simples informations sur le véhicule ou l'envoi d'une destination au GPS et même la MAJ du GPS nécessite maintenant un abonnement sur mon véhicule de plus de 3 ans, décevant à l'heure ou toutes les MAJ d'applications Android ou IOS ou autres objets connectés sont totalement gratuites....
english_content: Subscriptions at exorbitant prices for services often offered by other, less prestigious brands… Access to simple vehicle information, sending a destination to the GPS, and even GPS updates now requires a subscription on my vehicle that's over 3 years old – disappointing at a time when all updates for Android or iOS applications or other connected objects are completely free…

content: Super application qui vous tient informé de l'état du véhicule et de sa position.
english_content: Great app that keeps you informed about the vehicle's status and location.

content: Bon le déverrouillage digital key toujours pas dispo, la dernière mise à jour disait qu'il était dispo rien. Oui j'ai la bmw digital key sur ma voiture. Mais pas presser du côté des développeurs de corriger le problème. Je trouve que pour du 4,6/5 c'est un peut surcote pour ce que c'est il manque trop de fonction, alors qu'on pourrais faire bien plus.
english_content: Well, the digital key still isn't available, the last update said it was available, nothing. Yes, I have the BMW Digital Key on my car. But not in a hurry on the developers' side to fix the problem. I find that for a 4.6/5 it's a little overrated for what it is, too many functions are missing, when we could do so much more.

content: Je peux contrôler mon véhicule à distance. Régler la température de l'habitacle avant de partir, vérifier si tout est en ordre, son niveau de charge.... je peux regarder son environnement extérieur ou intérieur grâce aux caméras intégrées.... Vraiment très simple d'utilisation !
english_content: I can remotely control my vehicle. Adjust the cabin temperature before leaving, check if everything is in order, its charging level.... I can view its exterior or interior surroundings thanks to the integrated cameras.... Really very simple to use!

content: Impossible de charger la dernière mise à jour du software de la voiture. Et on est obligé de passer par cette appli inutile pour le faire. Merci BMW.
english_content: Impossible to load the latest software update for the car. And we're forced to go through this useless app to do it. Thanks, BMW.

content: application très utile, fonctionnelle, permet d'avoir toutes les informations sur le véhicule en temps réel.
english_content: Very useful application, functional, allows you to have all vehicle information in real time.

content: Très pratique, contrôle du véhicule à tout moment.
english_content: Very practical, vehicle control at any time.

content: Bonne application pour trouver les bornes électriques 👍
english_content: Good app for finding charging stations 👍

content: plus rien ne fonctionne et en plus il me dis toujours que j'ai une fenêtre ouverte c'est vraiment chiant.
english_content: Nothing works anymore, and on top of that, it keeps telling me I have a window open. It’s really annoying.

content: Depuis la mise a jour, impossible de se connecter. Il y a un message qui me dit "pas de connexion internet" alors que j'ai la 4g. Dommage car elle fonctionnait avant. Déçu.
english_content: Since the update, it’s impossible to connect. There's a message telling me no internet connection even though I have 4G. A shame because it worked before. Disappointed.

content: Ne se connecte pas bien au véhicule contrairement à la précédente application (bmwi3) Du coup , pas possible de lancer le préchauffage ... Bref pas terrible du tout
english_content: Doesn't connect well to the vehicle unlike the previous app (bmwi3). So, it’s not possible to start the preconditioning... Briefly, it’s really not great at all.

content: Pour un véhicule électrique appli décevante par rapport à l'ancienne version : pas de jauge de niveau de charge batterie, pas de mode Edrive.. je désinstalle
english_content: For an electric vehicle, a disappointing app compared to the previous version: no battery charge level gauge, no eDrive mode… I’m uninstalling.
